page.title: 17BIOGRAPHY - DANIEL'S MORNING
page.content: At 7.45 I got up and made my breakfast. It is called Ready Brek and is an oat cereal you pour hot milk on. Then I put on my school uniform, grey trousers and pullover, white shirt and purple tie and went to Godshill Primary School. After Assembly when we have had a story and a hymn and said a prayer, we did Maths. At playtime I had my carton of milk (Not everyone has this, but I am not very big yet, so I do.) Then I went by school bus to the Swimming Pool at Medina High School in Newport. The instructor says I'm quite good but I need more confidence. Back at school I had sand- wiches for my dinner - white bread with luncheon meat. My friends who had school dinner had curry with rice and peas and carrots, then raspberry buns and milkshake. After dinner we all went out to play on the playground.
